About Me

Hi, my name is Candy! I work as a software engineer in San Francisco with a background in finance and management. Given my prior experiences, I work well with cross-functional teams as well as the business side of companies, and I synergize that skillset to make myself a better software engineer. If you're looking for someone like me, I'd love to connect!

Education

Advanced Software Engineering Immersive Bootcamp

California State University, Fullerton | Fullerton, CA 2015
Bachelor of Arts, Business Administration & Management
